Properties.string: Place this down, and teleport to it when needed.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
scale=.5 jumpcooldown=1 color=BrickColor.new("Toothpaste") transparency=.5 rate=1/30
local lastjump=tick() local debris=game:GetService("Debris") local cf=CFrame.new()
function waitfor(a,b,c) local c=c or 5*60 local d=tick()+c while a:FindFirstChild(b)==nil and tick()<=d do wait() end return a:FindFirstChild(b) end
wait(3)
local ct=waitfor(sp,"creator",5) if ct~=nil then if ct.Value~=nil and ct.Value.Character~=nil then local holo=Instance.new("Model") holo.Name="Hologram" holo.Parent=sp
t=Instance.new("Part") t.Name="Torso" t.CanCollide=false t.Locked=true t.BrickColor=color t.Transparency=transparency t.FormFactor="Custom" t.Size=Vector3.new(2,2,1)*scale t.TopSurface="Smooth" t.BottomSurface="Smooth"
local h=Instance.new("Humanoid") h.MaxHealth=1 h.Health=1 h.Parent=holo
bp=Instance.new("BodyPosition") bp.maxForce=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*(10^7) bp.position=sp.Position+Vector3.new(0,4,0) bp.Parent=t
bg=Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.maxTorque=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*(10^7) bg.cframe=cf bg.Parent=t
t.CFrame=CFrame.new(sp.Position) t.Parent=holo
he=Instance.new("Part") he.Name="Head" he.CanCollide=false he.Locked=true he.BrickColor=color he.Transparency=1 he.FormFactor="Custom" he.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) he.TopSurface="Smooth" he.BottomSurface="Smooth" local neck=Instance.new("Weld") neck.Name="Neck" neck.Part0=t neck.Part1=he neck.C0=CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0,1.5,0)*scale) neck.Parent=t he.Parent=holo
fhe=Instance.new("Part") fhe.Name="FakeHead" fhe.CanCollide=false fhe.Locked=true fhe.BrickColor=color fhe.Transparency=transparency fhe.FormFactor="Custom" fhe.Size=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*scale fhe.TopSurface="Smooth" fhe.BottomSurface="Smooth" local fneck=Instance.new("Weld") fneck.Name="FakeNeck" fneck.Part0=t fneck.Part1=fhe fneck.C0=CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0,1.5,0)*scale) fneck.Parent=t fhe.Parent=holo
la=Instance.new("Part") la.Name="Left Arm" la.CanCollide=false la.Locked=true la.BrickColor=color la.Transparency=transparency la.FormFactor="Custom" la.Size=Vector3.new(1,2,1)*scale la.TopSurface="Smooth" la.BottomSurface="Smooth" local leftshoulder=Instance.new("Weld") leftshoulder.Name="LeftShoulder" leftshoulder.Part0=t leftshoulder.Part1=la leftshoulder.C0=CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-1.5,0,0)*scale) leftshoulder.Parent=t la.Parent=holo
ra=Instance.new("Part") ra.Name="Right Arm" ra.CanCollide=false ra.Locked=true ra.BrickColor=color ra.Transparency=transparency ra.FormFactor="Custom" ra.Size=Vector3.new(1,2,1)*scale ra.TopSurface="Smooth" ra.BottomSurface="Smooth" local rightshoulder=Instance.new("Weld") rightshoulder.Name="RightShoulder" rightshoulder.Part0=t rightshoulder.Part1=ra rightshoulder.C0=CFrame.new(Vector3.new(1.5,0,0)*scale) rightshoulder.Parent=t ra.Parent=holo
ll=Instance.new("Part") ll.Name="Left Leg" ll.CanCollide=false ll.Locked=true ll.BrickColor=color ll.Transparency=transparency ll.FormFactor="Custom" ll.Size=Vector3.new(1,2,1)*scale ll.TopSurface="Smooth" ll.BottomSurface="Smooth" local leftshoulder=Instance.new("Weld") leftshoulder.Name="LeftHip" leftshoulder.Part0=t leftshoulder.Part1=ll leftshoulder.C0=CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-.5,-2,0)*scale) leftshoulder.Parent=t ll.Parent=holo
rl=Instance.new("Part") rl.Name="Right Leg" rl.CanCollide=false rl.Locked=true rl.BrickColor=color rl.Transparency=transparency rl.FormFactor="Custom" rl.Size=Vector3.new(1,2,1)*scale rl.TopSurface="Smooth" rl.BottomSurface="Smooth" local rightshoulder=Instance.new("Weld") rightshoulder.Name="RightHip" rightshoulder.Part0=t rightshoulder.Part1=rl rightshoulder.C0=CFrame.new(Vector3.new(.5,-2,0)*scale) rightshoulder.Parent=t rl.Parent=holo
for i,v in ipairs(ct.Value.Character:GetChildren()) do if v.className=="CharacterMesh" then local cm=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") cm.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="..tostring(v.MeshId) cm.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1,1)*scale if v.BodyPart.Name=="Head" then cm.Parent=he elseif v.BodyPart.Name=="LeftArm" then cm.Parent=la elseif v.BodyPart.Name=="LeftLeg" then cm.Parent=ll elseif v.BodyPart.Name=="RightArm" then cm.Parent=ra elseif v.BodyPart.Name=="RightLeg" then cm.Parent=rl elseif v.BodyPart.Name=="Torso" then cm.Parent=t end elseif v.className=="Accoutrement" or v.className=="Hat" then local hndl=v:FindFirstChild("Handle") if hndl~=nil then local hndl=hndl:clone() hndl.BrickColor=color hndl.Transparency=transparency hndl.Reflectance=0 for i2,v2 in ipairs(hndl:GetChildren()) do if v2.className=="SpecialMesh" then v2.TextureId="" v2.Scale=v2.Scale*scale end end local hw=Instance.new("Weld") hw.Name="HandleWeld" hw.Part0=fhe hw.Part1=hndl hw.C1=(v.AttachmentPoint*CFrame.new(v.AttachmentPoint.p*(-1)))*CFrame.new(v.AttachmentPoint.p*scale)-Vector3.new(0,.5*scale,0) hw.Parent=hndl hndl.Parent=holo end elseif v.Name=="Head" then local hm=v:FindFirstChild("Mesh") if hm~=nil then hm:clone().Parent=fhe end end end
gui=sp:FindFirstChild("JumpPointGui") if gui~=nil then local jumpbutton=gui:FindFirstChild("JumpButton") local plrgui=ct.Value:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if plrgui~=nil and jumpbutton~=nil then gui.Parent=plrgui jumpbutton.MouseButton1Down:connect(function() if ct~=nil and ct.Value~=nil and ct.Value.Character~=nil and tick()-lastjump>jumpcooldown then local torso=ct.Value.Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") local humanoid=ct.Value.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if torso~=nil and humanoid~=nil and humanoid.Health>0 and t~=nil then local sound=sp:FindFirstChild("WarpSound") if sound~=nil then sound:Play() end local tcf=torso.CFrame delay(0,function() local p=Instance.new("Part") p.BrickColor=color p.FormFactor="Custom" p.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) p.Anchored=true p.CanCollide=false p.TopSurface="Smooth" p.BottomSurface="Smooth" p.Name="Effect" local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshType="Sphere" m.Parent=p debris:AddItem(p,5) p.CFrame=tcf p.Parent=game.Workspace
local p2=Instance.new("Part") p2.BrickColor=color p2.FormFactor="Custom" p2.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) p2.Anchored=true p2.CanCollide=false p2.TopSurface="Smooth" p2.BottomSurface="Smooth" p2.Name="Effect" local m2=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m2.MeshType="Sphere" m2.Parent=p2 debris:AddItem(p2,5) p2.CFrame=t.CFrame p2.Parent=game.Workspace
frames=.5/rate for frame=1,frames do local percent=frame/frames m.Scale=Vector3.new(5,5,5)*(1-percent)*8 p.Transparency=percent m2.Scale=Vector3.new(5,5,5)*percent*8 p2.Transparency=percent wait(rate) end end) torso.CFrame=t.CFrame lastjump=tick() end end end) end end while ct~=nil and ct.Value~=nil and ct.Value.Character~=nil and gui~=nil and gui.Parent~=nil and bp~=nil and bg~=nil and h~=nil and holo~=nil and h.Parent==holo and holo.Parent==sp and h.Health>0 do cf=cf*CFrame.Angles(0,.05,0) bp.position=sp.Position+Vector3.new(0,4,0) bg.cframe=cf wait(.15) end end end
if bg~=nil then bg:remove() end if bp~=nil then bp:remove() end if gui~=nil then gui:remove() end local e=Instance.new("Explosion") e.BlastPressure=0 e.Position=sp.Position e.Parent=game.Workspace --Maybe add a sound wait(.5) sp:remove()

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
local debris=game:GetService("Debris") equipped=false check=true
sp.Equipped:connect(function(mouse) if mouse~=nil then equipped=true mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() local chr=sp.Parent if chr and check and equipped then local t=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") local h=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local animobject1=sp:FindFirstChild("ButtonPress") local animobject2=sp:FindFirstChild("Toss") if t and h and animobject1 and animobject2 and equipped then if h.Health>0 then check=false anim1=h:LoadAnimation(animobject1) if anim1 and h and h~=nil and h.Health>0 and equipped then anim1:Play() wait(1.6) sp.Handle.BeepTone:Play() wait(.6) sp.Handle.BeepTone:Play() wait(.5) end anim2=h:LoadAnimation(animobject2) if anim2 and h and h~=nil and h.Health>0 and equipped then anim2:Play() wait(1.2) end if equipped then local p=sp.Handle:clone() p.CanCollide=true p.Name="Jump Point" p.Anchored=false p.Velocity=(t.CFrame.lookVector*20)+Vector3.new(0,20,0) local s=sp.Script:clone() s.Parent=p s.Disabled=false local gui=sp.JumpPointGui:clone() gui.Parent=p local ct=Instance.new("ObjectValue") ct.Name="creator" ct.Value=game.Players.LocalPlayer ct.Parent=p local gyro=Instance.new("BodyGyro") --this will keep the thing standing upright. gyro.Parent=p p.Parent=game.Workspace sp:remove() end check=true end end end end) end end)
sp.Unequipped:connect(function() equipped=false end)
